    SAI LAWRENCE & DOMINIC PLT Vacancies ADMIN ASSISTANTS (行政助理 兼 前台)

    November 11, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    SAI LAWRENCE & DOMINIC PLT is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for ADMIN ASSISTANTS (行政助理 兼 前台) position. If you currently looking for new job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    WHO ARE WE: 关于我们公司

    We are a team of highly skilled professionals in Kulai, delivering high quality all rounded management and professional services fulfilling the business needs of the client.

    We happen to have some vacancies now, interested to know more? Send in your application.

    我们是位于古来的一个专业服务团队，致力于提供最完善的管理与专业服务，满足客户的生意上的专业需求。

    我们现在正好有一个职位空缺，想要知道更多详情？ 请投入你的申请。

    WHAT YOU WILL BE DOING: 工作范围

    Admin Assistant & Receptionist:

    • You will be the first contact point of the firm, you will receiving the calls and the walk-ins, greeting them in the upmost professionalism and most welcoming manner possible.
    • You will be directing the calls and the visitors to the respective persons in-charge, and to seat them in the respective waiting areas if necessary
    • You will be handling the daily ins and outs of documents exercising best possible care of the documents, as all documents are important and sometimes of private & confidential nature.
    • You will also be learning some basic accounting knowledge through handling some basic accounting administrative matters.

    行政助理 兼 前台 ：

    • 你将会是我们事务所的门面，你必须永远保持最高的专业和亲切的服务态度，来接待任何的来电和上门的顾客
    • 你必须把相关的来电 / 客户转接给相关负责人，或把客户接待去相关等待区域
    • 你将会用最好的方式把所有进出的文件处理好，因为所有在我们事务所的文件性质都是重要，重则具有私人资料的。
    • 你将会学习和处理一些基本会计相关的文职、行政方面的工作

    WHAT WE EXPECT FROM YOU: 公司对你的要求

    First, you must be responsible to your own work, typo and human error are not permitted as one must always be proud of his / her work done.

    Second, commitment to high quality services. You MUST share our common vision to serve our client by providing the best services.

    Third, handle any situation with utmost professionalism. We are professionals and shall always maintain so in any situation.

    We do not simply bring in any person into our core team, only the worthy and qualified one will be admitted to join us. Only apply if you think you are worthy to take on this responsibility.

    第一， 你必须对自己的工作负责任，任何粗心错误是不能被接受的，专业服务人员必须永远为自己的处理的文件 / 报表感到骄傲。

    第二， 秉持提供高品质服务的心态。你必须和我们共享一样的理念，永远提供高品质服务给我们的客户。

    第三， 不论任何情况下，请保持专业姿态 / 笑容。你必须有这个能力确保自己在任何情况下保持最专业状态。

    我们的团队不随意接纳任何新人，只有真心觉得能胜任的人才会被接纳。如果你真心觉得能符合以上条件，请投入你的申请。 

    WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT FROM US: 公司能提供给你的

    The best reward you get will be the career fulfillment by putting your talent to good use, to serve the business world with your service.

    The financial rewards will come along the way to support and allow you to afford a comfortable lifestyle.

    Examples of financial rewards are as follow,

    Category 1: completion of probation period of at least 3 months

    1. Travel allowance (monthly): RM 100

    2. Meal allowance (monthly): RM 100

    Category 2: completion of 1 year full time employment period:

    1. Further increase in monthly meal allowance

    2. Eligible for annual performance bonus

    3. Fully subsidized annual company trip

    4. Subsidies to parking expenses

    5. Subsidies to annual renewal of professional memberships

    6. Subsidies to fulfilling annual minimum CPD hours.

    在我们团队里，最大的回报是见识你自己的能力去完善的发挥，看见你自己的价值得到肯定，让自己的能力去服务商业世界。

    同时，公司也会确保你得到应有的基本的财务经济上的福利。 基本福利如下：

    第一类型： 完成至少三个月的试用期的：

    1。 每月交通津贴：RM 100

    2。 每月伙食津贴：RM 100

    第二类型： 工作满一年以上：

    1。额外伙食津贴

    2。可得到依据工作表现的年终奖金

    3。公司年度旅行津贴

    4。停车费津贴

    5。专业会计相关公会年费津贴

    6。专业培训课程的费用津贴 （20 小时的年度强制的）

    Company Overview

    WHO ARE WE:  关于我们公司
    We are an accounting practice providing one stop management services (accounting, taxation, secretarial, audit, etc), established in the town of Kulai sometime 30 years ago, with a 10 years old branch office previously in Johor Jaya  relocated to the new office now in Desa Tebrau half a decade ago. Despite being a long established firm, we emphasized and sustained the culture to keep the firm passionate and vibrant like a start-up.
    创立于1985 年，有三十多年历史，本公司提供一站式管理服务 （包括会计，税务，审计，公司秘书等服务）。营业扩充和应付顾客的需求，我们在大约 2012 年将营业近十年历史的柔佛再也分行搬迁至  Desa Tebrau。长远的历史并不约束我们的营业模式，管理层坚持秉持像初创企业般的热衷与充满活力的办公文化。

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream job in Johor.
    Apply Online
